name: Dandelion Hitchhike
description:
The player (Dandelion) wants to go to New York but of course, she can not move by herself. She doesn’t care how many generations it takes, she shoots her seed up, hoping that her descendents will reach the destination.

Genre

Casual Platformer

How to play

wasd or Arrow Key: Move

z key: Make dandelion to grow

x key: Shoot the seed up

Mouse Click: Click the button

Created by

DDA The Lazy Ant

DuckLADY
